languages.text: "Значит, пора нам становиться крупными игроками, а?" {n}Кор подмигивает Джай.{/n} "Я знаю пару чегнарей из Ультреквизиторов, они — сушеные. Мы могли бы позвать их остыть с нами. И в других алтарях найдутся желающие... Сможем потягаться и с Фалько, и даже Владайму дунуть в шлюз".

"That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitors, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."
languages.original_text: "Значит, пора нам становиться крупными игроками, а?" {n}Кор подмигивает Джай.{/n} "Я знаю пару чегнарей из Ультреквизиторов, они — сушеные. Мы могли бы позвать их остыть с нами. И в других алтарях найдутся желающие... Сможем потягаться и с Фалько, и даже Владайму дунуть в шлюз".

traits.locale_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitioners, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."
traits.speaker: Kor

traits.locale_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitioners, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."

traits.locale_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitioners, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."

traits.locale_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitors, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: “也就是说，咱们熬出头的机会终于来了，是吧？”{n}科尔朝婕伊眨了眨眼。{/n}“我认识几个巨贩帮的买卖人，他们都很能干，你肯定会很喜欢。咱们可以找他们聊聊，把他们全都挖过来。而且，肯定还有别的山头的人打算加入咱们……咱们说不定可以干掉法尔科，说不定可以把弗拉迪姆一起扔出气闸。”
languages.original_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitors, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，咱们熬出头的机会终于来了，是吧？”{n}科尔朝婕伊眨了眨眼。{/n}“我认识几个巨贩帮的买卖人，他们都很能干，你肯定会很喜欢。咱们可以找他们聊聊，把他们全都挖过来。而且，肯定还有别的山头的人打算加入咱们……咱们说不定可以干掉法尔科，说不定可以把弗拉迪姆一起扔出气闸。”
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: 「それはつまり、たちがステップアップしてメジャーデビューする時が来たってことだろう？」{n}コーはジェイにウィンクする。{/n}「ウルトレクイジターのシェグナーを何人か知っている。連中は、お前のようにドライな奴らだ。俺達は、連中にずっと待っているように言えばいい。他の祭壇にはもっと意欲的なヤツがいるだろうし…ファルコを相手にしたっていいし、ヴラダイムをエアロックから吹き飛ばしてもいい」
languages.original_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitors, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."

traits.locale_text: 「それはつまり、たちがステップアップしてメジャーデビューする時が来たってことだろう？」{n}コーはジェイにウィンクする。{/n}「ウルトレクイジターのシェグナーを何人か知っている。連中は、お前のようにドライな奴らだ。俺達は、連中にずっと待っているように言えばいい。他の祭壇にはもっと意欲的なヤツがいるだろうし…ファルコを相手にしたっていいし、ヴラダイムをエアロックから吹き飛ばしてもいい」
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: «Eso significa que nos toca ir a mayores, ¿no?». {n}Kor le guiña un ojo a Jae.{/n} «Conozco a un par de chegnars de los Ultrequisadores, están completamente secos. Podríamos decirles que nos acompañen para descansar un poco. Y habrá más gente dispuesta en los otros altares... Podríamos hacerle frente a Falco e incluso echar a Vladaym por la esclusa».
languages.original_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitors, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."

traits.locale_text: «Eso significa que nos toca ir a mayores, ¿no?». {n}Kor le guiña un ojo a Jae.{/n} «Conozco a un par de chegnars de los Ultrequisadores, están completamente secos. Podríamos decirles que nos acompañen para descansar un poco. Y habrá más gente dispuesta en los otros altares... Podríamos hacerle frente a Falco e incluso echar a Vladaym por la esclusa».
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: « Ça veut dire qu'il est temps pour nous d'entrer dans la cour des grands, hein ? {n}dit Kor en faisant un clin d'œil à Jae.{/n} Je connais une poignée de chegnars chez les Ultrequisitors. On pourrait les inviter à se détendre avec nous, et on n'aura aucun mal à trouver d'autres volontaires aux autres autels... Ça nous permettrait de régler son compte à Falco et même de nous débarrasser de Vladaym, tant qu'on y est. »
languages.original_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitors, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."

traits.locale_text: « Ça veut dire qu'il est temps pour nous d'entrer dans la cour des grands, hein ? {n}dit Kor en faisant un clin d'œil à Jae.{/n} Je connais une poignée de chegnars chez les Ultrequisitors. On pourrait les inviter à se détendre avec nous, et on n'aura aucun mal à trouver d'autres volontaires aux autres autels... Ça nous permettrait de régler son compte à Falco et même de nous débarrasser de Vladaym, tant qu'on y est. »
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: "Für uns wird es also Zeit, uns hervorzutun und zu Hauptakteuren zu werden!" {n}Kor zwinkert Jae an.{/n} "Ich kenne ein paar Chegnar von den Ultrequisitoren, die sind extrem trocken. Wir könnten ihnen vorschlagen, dass sie zusammen mit uns abwarten sollen. Und an den anderen Altären warten sicher noch mehr Willige ... Wir könnten es mit Falco aufnehmen und am Ende sogar Vladaym vom Thron stoßen."
languages.original_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitors, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."

traits.locale_text: "Für uns wird es also Zeit, uns hervorzutun und zu Hauptakteuren zu werden!" {n}Kor zwinkert Jae an.{/n} "Ich kenne ein paar Chegnar von den Ultrequisitoren, die sind extrem trocken. Wir könnten ihnen vorschlagen, dass sie zusammen mit uns abwarten sollen. Und an den anderen Altären warten sicher noch mehr Willige ... Wir könnten es mit Falco aufnehmen und am Ende sogar Vladaym vom Thron stoßen."
traits.speaker: Kor

languages.text: "İnisiyatif almamızın ve büyük oyunculardan biri olmamızın zamanı geldi ha?" {n}Kor, Jae'a göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Ultragizisyonculardan bir iki çegnar tanıyorum. Olabildiğince düz tiplerdir. Gelip ayaklarını yanımızda dinlendirmelerini söyleyebiliriz. Diğer sunaklarda başkaları da olabilir. Falco'yu indirebiliriz, hatta Vladaym'ı bile hava kilidinden fırlatabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "That means it's time for us to step up and become major players, eh?" {n}Kor winks at Jae.{/n} "I know a couple of chegnars from the Ultrequisitors, they're dry as you like. We could tell them to cool their heels with us. And there'll be more willing at the other altars... We could take on Falco, and even blow Vladaym out the airlock too."

traits.locale_text: "Bu da demek oluyor ki inisiyatif almamızın ve büyük oyunculardan biri olmamızın zamanı ha?" {n}Kor, Jae'a göz kırpıyor.{/n} "Ultragizisyonculardan bir iki çegnar tanıyorum. Olabildiğince düz tiplerdir. Gelip ayaklarını yanımızda dinlendirmelerini söyleyebiliriz. Diğer sunaklarda başkaları da olabilir. Falco'yu indirebiliriz, hatta Vladaym'ı bile hava kilidinden fırlatabiliriz."
traits.speaker: Kor
